scripts.build:dev: r.js.cmd -o optimize=none baseUrl=. paths.error-stack-parser=empty: paths.lodash=empty: paths.angular=empty: shim.angular.eports=angular shim.lodash.exports=_ name=index out=build/cm.js
scripts.build:prod: r.js.cmd -o baseUrl=. paths.error-stack-parser=empty: paths.lodash=empty: paths.angular=empty: shim.angular.eports=angular shim.lodash.exports=_ name=index out=build/cm.min.js
scripts.build: npm run-script build:dev && npm run-script build:prod
